iana.encoding_considerations:
application/xml as specified in [RFC3023].

Security considerations:   See Section 10 of [RFC3023] and
Section 12 of [RFC6917].

Interoperability considerations:   none.

Published specification:   Section 10 of [RFC6917].

Applications which use this media type:   This media type is used to
support a Media Resource Broker (MRB) entity.

iana.template_text:
(file created 2013-02-22, last updated 2013-04-15)

Type name:   application

Subtype name:   mrb-publish+xml

Required parameters:   none

Optional parameters:   Same as charset parameter of application/xml
as specified in [RFC3023].

Encoding considerations:   Same as encoding considerations of
application/xml as specified in [RFC3023].

Security considerations:   See Section 10 of [RFC3023] and
Section 12 of [RFC6917].

Interoperability considerations:   none.

Published specification:   Section 10 of [RFC6917].

Applications which use this media type:   This media type is used to
support a Media Resource Broker (MRB) entity.
